TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ObjectFlowControl/ForLoopControl extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides services to the Visual Basic compiler for compiling loops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
